site_name: Ferrymans Quay William Morris WayLondonSW6 2UT
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: T1 Birch - Cut back from building and reduce co dominant stem by 2m. T4 Lime - Reduce crown by 2m back to previous pruning points. T6 Sugar Maple - Reduce crown by 3m back to previous pruning points. T7 Sugar Maple - Reduce crown by 3m back to previous pruning points. T8 Hornbeam - Reduce crown by 1m back to previous pruning points. T10 Hornbeam - Reduce crown by 1m back to previous pruning points. T11 Hornbeam - Reduce crown by 1m back to previous pruning points. T12 Hornbeam - Reduce crown by 1m back to previous pruning points. G1 Hornbeams - Reduce crown by 1m back to previous pruning points. G2 Hornbeams - Reduce crown by 1m back to previous pruning points.
